txt.en: You turn the pages and come to an account of the sad end of Balin's expedition. It is grim reading.
You think about what you have read and mourn the death of Balin and his loyal companions in the dark reaches of Moria.
You turn the pages and become immersed in the chronicle of 'We Cannot Get Out.'
You have chosen to read from the Chronicle of Events concerning the sad end of Balin's expedition to Moria.
